mapper.insert: insert into book_table(bookName, unitPrice, unitsInStock, author, descript, publisher, category, conditions, fileAttached) values (#{bookName}, #{unitPrice}, #{unitsInStock}, #{author}, #{descript}, #{publisher}, #{category}, #{conditions}, #{fileAttached})
insert into book_file_table(originalFileName, storedFileName, bookId) values (#{originalFileName}, #{storedFileName}, #{bookId})
